title: Executor notified
question: Have you notified {executorName} in writing that you are applying?
legend: Have you notified {executorName} in writing that you are applying?
informInWriting: You must inform the executor in writing that you are applying for probate

required.summary: You haven’t selected whether you have notified the executor in writing or not
required.message: Answer ‘yes’ if you have have notified the executor in writing
